xhochy commented on issue #3107: ARROW-3943: [R] vignette
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3107#issuecomment-444574172
 
 
   @romainfrancois I wondering whether we could combine this into the general Sphinx documentation. We are currently merging the Python and C++ infrastructure with the general Arrow format documentation over at https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2856
   
   Disclaimer: As I'm not an R expert, I have no idea how well this plays with the R ecosystem.

----------------------------------------------------------------

wesm commented on issue #3107: ARROW-3943: [R] vignette
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3107#issuecomment-444591600
 
 
   It's customary to include a vignette with CRAN packages. See https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/dplyr/index.html. So even if we publish this on arrow.apache.org, we still would probably need to have a vignette. 

----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.
 
For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org

xhochy commented on issue #3107: ARROW-3943: [R] vignette
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3107#issuecomment-444592634
 
 
   So a vignette is a something between a TL;DR paragraph and the fully fledged package documentation? This means we would probably have the vignette and would write a fully featured documentation somewhere else? That sounds good to me.

----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.

users@infra.apache.org

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.

comments.body:
[~romainfrancois] I am a moderate R coder looking for ways to contribute to the arrow project. I do not have C++ knowledge so I was thinking I might be able to best contribute contribute through assisting with documentation or vignettes. Can you please let me know if you this is a reasonable place to start or where you and others working on R/Arrow might need some additional help. 

 

Thanks,

Greg
This is being done in ARROW-5505.
